midas/examples/experiment/adcsum.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         adcsum.c
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00005 
00006   Contents:     Example analyzer module for ADC summing. This module
00007                 looks for a bank named CADC and produces an ASUM
00008                 bank which contains the sum of all ADC values. The
00009                 ASUM bank is a "structured" bank. It has been defined
00010                 in the ODB and transferred to experim.h.
00011 
00012   $Log: adcsum.c,v $
00013   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:11  mucap

00015   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)

00055 /*-- Include files -------------------------------------------------*/
00056 
00057 /* standard includes */
00058 #include <stdio.h>
00059 #include <math.h>
00060 
00061 #define DEFINE_TESTS // must be defined prior to midas.h
00062 
00063 /* midas includes */
00064 #include "midas.h"
00065 #include "experim.h"
00066 #include "analyzer.h"
00067 
00068 /* root includes */
00069 #include <TH1F.h>
00070 
00071 #ifndef PI
00072 #define PI 3.14159265359
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 /*-- Parameters ----------------------------------------------------*/
00076 
00077 ADC_SUMMING_PARAM adc_summing_param;
00078 
00079 /*-- Tests ---------------------------------------------------------*/
00080 
00081 DEF_TEST(low_sum);
00082 DEF_TEST(high_sum);
00083 
00084 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00085 
00086 INT adc_summing(EVENT_HEADER *, void *);
00087 INT adc_summing_init(void);
00088 INT adc_summing_bor(INT run_number);
00089 
00090 ADC_SUMMING_PARAM_STR(adc_summing_param_str);
00091 
00092 ANA_MODULE adc_summing_module = {
00093    "ADC summing",               /* module name           */
00094    "Stefan Ritt",               /* author                */
00095    adc_summing,                 /* event routine         */
00096    NULL,                        /* BOR routine           */
00097    NULL,                        /* EOR routine           */
00098    adc_summing_init,            /* init routine          */
00099    NULL,                        /* exit routine          */
00100    &adc_summing_param,          /* parameter structure   */
00101    sizeof(adc_summing_param),   /* structure size        */
00102    adc_summing_param_str,       /* initial parameters    */
00103 };
00104 
00105 /*-- Module-local variables-----------------------------------------*/
00106 
00107 static TH1F *hAdcSum, *hAdcAvg;
00108 
00109 /*-- init routine --------------------------------------------------*/
00110 
00111 INT adc_summing_init(void)
00112 {
00113    /* book ADC sum histo */
00114    hAdcSum = H1_BOOK("ADCSUM", "ADC sum", 500, 0, 10000);
00115 
00116    /* book ADC average in separate subfolder */
00117    open_subfolder("Average");
00118    hAdcAvg = H1_BOOK("ADCAVG", "ADC average", 500, 0, 10000);
00119    close_subfolder();
00120 
00121    return SUCCESS;
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*-- event routine -------------------------------------------------*/
00125 
00126 INT adc_summing(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00127 {
00128    INT i, j, n_adc;
00129    float *cadc;
00130    ASUM_BANK *asum;
00131 
00132    /* look for CADC bank, return if not present */
00133    n_adc = bk_locate(pevent, "CADC", &cadc);
00134    if (n_adc == 0)
00135       return 1;
00136 
00137    /* create ADC sum bank */
00138    bk_create(pevent, "ASUM", TID_STRUCT, &asum);
00139 
00140    /* sum all channels above threashold */
00141    asum->sum = 0.f;
00142    for (i = j = 0; i < n_adc; i++)
00143       if (cadc[i] > adc_summing_param.adc_threshold) {
00144          asum->sum += cadc[i];
00145          j++;
00146       }
00147 
00148    /* calculate ADC average */
00149    asum->average = j > 0 ? asum->sum / j : 0;
00150 
00151    /* evaluate tests */
00152    SET_TEST(low_sum, asum->sum < 1000);
00153    SET_TEST(high_sum, asum->sum > 1000);
00154 
00155    /* fill sum histo */
00156    hAdcSum->Fill(asum->sum, 1);
00157 
00158    /* fill average histo */
00159    hAdcAvg->Fill(asum->average);
00160 
00161    /* close calculated bank */
00162    bk_close(pevent, asum + 1);
00163 
00164    return SUCCESS;
00165 }
